description: Simple, intuitive and logical every-day-usage additions to the Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0 SP1 and newer. Follows the same namespace structure already found in the .NET Framework.
releaseNotes:
This comprehensive release contains several new features as well as some improvements.
The following work was completed for this release:

- New class, Mapping, in the Cuemon namespace that defines the mapping between a column/field/item in a data source and a column/field/item in the data destination
- New sealed class, IndexMapping, in the Cuemon namespace that defines the mapping between a column/field/item in a data source and a column/field/item in the data destination
- New sealed class, StreamWriterSettings, in the Cuemon.IO namespace that specifies a set of features to support on the StreamWriter object created by the StreamWriterUtility.CreateStream method
- New static class, StreamWriterUtility, in the Cuemon.IO namespace that is designed to make StreamWriter related operations easier to work with
- New sealed class, BulkCopyDataReader, in the Cuemon.Data namespace that provides a way of copying an existing object implementing the IDataReader interface to a filtered forward-only stream of rows that is mapped for bulk upload
- New abstract class, StringDataReader, in the Cuemon.Data namespace that provides a generic way of reading a forward-only stream of rows from a string based data source
- New sealed class, CsvDataReader, in the Cuemon.Data.CsvClient namespace that provides a way of reading a forward-only stream of rows from a CSV based data source
- New sealed class, XmlDataReader, in the Cuemon.Data.XmlClient namespace that provides a way of reading a forward-only stream of rows from an XML based data source

- New overloaded method, IsCountableSequence, on the NumberUtility class in the Cuemon namespace
- New method, IsCountableSequence, on the StringUtility class in the Cuemon namespace
- New overloaded method, Split, on the StringUtility class in the Cuemon namespace
- New overloaded method, GetMember, on the ReflectionUtility class in the Cuemon.Reflection namespace
- New overloaded method, GetMethod, on the ReflectionUtility class in the Cuemon.Reflection namespace
- New overloaded method, GetProperty, on the ReflectionUtility class in the Cuemon.Reflection namespace
- New overloaded method, ForWithResult, on the ParallelUtility class in the Cuemon.Threading namespace
- New overloaded method, ExecuteBulk, on the SqlDataManager class in the Cuemon.Data.SqlClient namespace
- New overloaded method, Parse, on the SqlDataManager class in the Cuemon.Data.SqlClient namespace
- New overloaded method, ToBulkCopyDataReader, on the SqlDataManager class in the Cuemon.Data.SqlClient namespace
- New method, ToSqlBulkCopyMappings, on the SqlDataManager class in the Cuemon.Data.SqlClient namespace
- New method, ToMappings, on the SqlDataManager class in the Cuemon.Data.SqlClient namespace

- Improved the ReflectionUtility class in the Cuemon.Reflection namespace to support deep hierarchy reflection when BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly is not specified
- Improved the GlobalModule class in the Cuemon.Web namespace to support the identity of an Application Pool for impersonation scenarios
- Improved the GlobalModule class in the Cuemon.Web namespace to support new extensibility ways when mingling with compression
- Improved the WebConfigurationUtility class in the Cuemon.Web.Configuration namespace to support impersonation
- Improved the XsltPage class in the Cuemon.Web.UI namespace to provide XSLT-based exceptions when something in a transformation fails

- Fixed a bug in the constructor on the DateSpan struct in the Cuemon namespace that inadvertently calculated months and total months wrong
- Fixed a bug in the InitializeCompression method on the GlobalModule class in the Cuemon.Web namespace that prevented one or more compressed files to be re-written when the source was changed
- Fixed a bug in the formatDate and formatTime methods on the XsltExtensionLibrary class in the Cuemon.Xml.Xsl namespace that did not use the specified culture in all member calls
summary: Cuemon .NET Framework is a free and flexible assembly package, built to extend and boost your codebelt - providing vast ways of possiblities for all breeds of coders, programmers, developers
title: Cuemon .NET Framework
